segments.source_content: # Swizzling

translations.zh-CN: # 组件置换(Swizzling)

segments.source_content: In this section, we will introduce how customization of layout is done in Docusaurus.

translations.zh-CN: 本节将介绍如何在Docusaurus中实现布局定制。

segments.source_content: > Déjà vu...?

translations.zh-CN: > 似曾相识...？

segments.source_content: This section is similar to [Styling and Layout](./styling-layout.mdx), but this time, we will customize React components themselves, rather than what they look like. We will talk about a central concept in Docusaurus: **swizzling**, which allows **deeper site customizations**.

translations.zh-CN: 本节内容与[样式与布局](./styling-layout.mdx)类似，但这次我们将定制React组件本身而非其外观样式。我们将讨论Docusaurus的核心概念：**组件置换**，该功能支持**更深层次的站点定制**。

segments.source_content: In practice, swizzling permits to **swap a theme component with your own implementation**, and it comes in 2 patterns:

translations.zh-CN: 实际操作中，组件置换可通过两种模式**替换主题组件为自定义实现**：

segments.source_content:
- [**Ejecting**](#ejecting): creates a **copy** of the original theme component, which you can fully **customize**
- [**Wrapping**](#wrapping): creates a **wrapper** around the original theme component, which you can **enhance**

translations.zh-CN:
- [**弹出(Ejecting)**](#ejecting)：创建原始主题组件的**副本**进行完全**自定义**
- [**包装(Wrapping)**](#wrapping)：创建原始主题组件的**包装器**进行功能**增强**

segments.source_content:
<details>

<summary>Why is it called swizzling?</summary>

**The name comes from Objective-C and Swift-UI**: [method swizzling](https://pspdfkit.com/blog/2019/swizzling-in-swift/) is the process of changing the implementation of an existing selector (method).

**For Docusaurus, component swizzling means providing an alternative component that takes precedence over the component provided by the theme.**

You can think of it as [Monkey Patching](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monkey_patch) for React components, enabling you to override the default implementation. Gatsby has a similar concept called [theme shadowing](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/docs/how-to/plugins-and-themes/shadowing/).

To gain a deeper understanding of this, you have to understand [how theme components are resolved](./advanced/client.mdx#theme-aliases).

</details>

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_21c93b79

segments.source_content: ## Swizzling Process

translations.zh-CN: ## 置换流程

segments.source_content: ### Overview

translations.zh-CN: ### 概述

segments.source_content: Docusaurus provides a convenient **interactive CLI** to swizzle components. You generally only need to remember the following command:

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus提供便捷的**交互式CLI工具**进行组件置换，通常只需记住以下命令：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run swizzle
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_4dd51304

segments.source_content: It will generate a new component in your `src/theme` directory, which should look like this example:

translations.zh-CN: 该命令会在`src/theme`目录生成新组件，示例如下：

segments.source_content:
```jsx title="src/theme/SomeComponent.js" import React from 'react'; export default function SomeComponent(props) { // You can fully customize this implementation // including changing the JSX, CSS and React hooks return (

Some Component

Some component implementation details

); } ``` ```jsx title="src/theme/SomeComponent.js" import React from 'react'; import SomeComponent from '@theme-original/SomeComponent'; export default function SomeComponentWrapper(props) { // You can enhance the original component, // including adding extra props or JSX elements around it return ( <> ); } ```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_e2ae1ac7

segments.source_content: To get an overview of all the themes and components available to swizzle, run:

translations.zh-CN: 要查看所有可置换主题和组件的概览，请运行：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run swizzle -- --list
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_65400624

segments.source_content: Use `--help` to see all available CLI options, or refer to the reference [swizzle CLI documentation](./cli.mdx#docusaurus-swizzle).

translations.zh-CN: 使用`--help`查看所有CLI选项，或参考[swizzle CLI文档](./cli.mdx#docusaurus-swizzle)。

segments.source_content:
:::tip[Removing Unneeded Swizzled Components]

If you decide that a previously swizzled component is no longer necessary, you can simply remove its file(s) from the `src/theme` directory. After removing the component, make sure to restart your development server to ensure the changes are properly reflected.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip[移除不再需要的置换组件]

若决定不再需要某个已置换组件，只需从`src/theme`目录删除其文件。删除后请重启开发服务器以确保变更生效。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::note

After swizzling a component, **restart your dev server** in order for Docusaurus to know about the new component.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::note

置换组件后，请**重启开发服务器**以使Docusaurus识别新组件。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::warning[Prefer staying on the safe side]

Be sure to understand [which components are **safe to swizzle**](#what-is-safe-to-swizzle). Some components are **internal implementation details** of a theme.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::warning[建议保持安全边界]

请务必理解[哪些组件可安全置换](#what-is-safe-to-swizzle)。部分组件是主题的**内部实现细节**。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::info

`docusaurus swizzle` is only an automated way to help you swizzle the component. You can also create the `src/theme/SomeComponent.js` file manually, and Docusaurus will [resolve it](./advanced/client.mdx#theme-aliases). There's no internal magic behind this command!

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info

`docusaurus swizzle`仅是自动化置换工具。您也可以手动创建`src/theme/SomeComponent.js`文件，Docusaurus会[自动解析](./advanced/client.mdx#theme-aliases)。该命令背后并无特殊机制！

:::

segments.source_content: ### Ejecting {#ejecting}

translations.zh-CN: ### 弹出(Ejecting) {#ejecting}

segments.source_content: Ejecting a theme component is the process of **creating a copy** of the original theme component, which you can **fully customize and override**.

translations.zh-CN: 弹出主题组件是指**创建原始组件的副本**，您可对其进行**完全自定义和重写**。

segments.source_content: To eject a theme component, use the swizzle CLI interactively, or with the `--eject` option:

translations.zh-CN: 要弹出主题组件，可使用交互式swizzle CLI或带`--eject`选项：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run swizzle [theme name] [component name] -- --eject
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_1a63b635

segments.source_content: An example:

translations.zh-CN: 示例：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run swizzle @docusaurus/theme-classic Footer -- --eject
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_4e583d18

segments.source_content: This will copy the current `<Footer />` component's implementation to your site's `src/theme` directory. Docusaurus will now use this `<Footer>` component copy instead of the original one. You are now free to completely re-implement the `<Footer>` component.

translations.zh-CN: 此操作会将当前`<Footer />`组件实现复制到站点的`src/theme`目录。Docusaurus将使用该副本而非原始组件。您现在可以完全重新实现`<Footer>`组件。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_18fb666f

segments.source_content:
:::warning

Ejecting an [**unsafe**](#what-is-safe-to-swizzle) component can sometimes lead to copying a large amount of internal code, which you now have to maintain yourself. It can make Docusaurus upgrades more difficult, as you will need to migrate your customizations if the props received or internal theme APIs used have changed.

**Prefer [wrapping](#wrapping) whenever possible**: the amount of code to maintain is smaller.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::warning

弹出[**不安全**](#what-is-safe-to-swizzle)组件可能导致复制大量需自行维护的内部代码。当接收的props或使用的内部主题API变更时，会使Docusaurus升级更困难。

**尽可能选择[包装](#wrapping)**：需维护的代码量更少。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::tip[Re-swizzling]

To keep ejected components up-to-date after a Docusaurus upgrade, re-run the eject command and compare the changes with `git diff`. You are also recommended to write a brief comment at the top of the file explaining what changes you have made, so that you could more easily re-apply your changes after re-ejection.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip[重新混编]

为了在Docusaurus升级后保持已弹出组件的更新，请重新运行弹出命令并使用`git diff`比较变更。建议在文件顶部添加简短注释说明您所做的修改，以便在重新弹出后更轻松地重新应用这些变更。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Wrapping {#wrapping}

translations.zh-CN: ### 包装模式 {#wrapping}

segments.source_content: Wrapping a theme component is the process of **creating a wrapper** around the original theme component, which you can **enhance**.

translations.zh-CN: 包装主题组件是指**围绕原始主题组件创建包装器**，从而对其进行**功能增强**的过程。

segments.source_content: To wrap a theme component, use the swizzle CLI interactively, or with the `--wrap` option:

translations.zh-CN: 要包装主题组件，可通过交互式swizzle CLI或使用`--wrap`选项实现：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run swizzle [theme name] [component name] -- --wrap
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_71779666

segments.source_content: An example:

translations.zh-CN: 示例：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run swizzle @docusaurus/theme-classic Footer -- --wrap
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_90c0aa8a

segments.source_content: This will create a wrapper in your site's `src/theme` directory. Docusaurus will now use the `<FooterWrapper>` component instead of the original one. You can now add customizations around the original component.

translations.zh-CN: 这将在您站点的`src/theme`目录中创建包装器组件。Docusaurus现在将使用`<FooterWrapper>`组件替代原始组件。您现在可以在原始组件周围添加自定义功能。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_9bc650e1

segments.source_content: What is this @theme-original thing? Docusaurus uses [theme aliases](./advanced/client.mdx#theme-aliases) to resolve the theme components to use. The newly created wrapper takes the `@theme/SomeComponent` alias. `@theme-original/SomeComponent` permits to import original component that the wrapper shadows without creating an infinite import loop where the wrapper imports itself.

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_e3b46a91

segments.source_content: ## What is safe to swizzle? {#what-is-safe-to-swizzle}

translations.zh-CN: ## 哪些组件可以安全混编？ {#what-is-safe-to-swizzle}

segments.source_content: > With great power comes great responsibility

translations.zh-CN: > 能力越大，责任越大

segments.source_content: Some theme components are **internal implementation details** of a theme. Docusaurus allows you to swizzle them, but it **might be risky**.

translations.zh-CN: 部分主题组件属于主题的**内部实现细节**。虽然Docusaurus允许混编这些组件，但**可能存在风险**。

segments.source_content:
<details>

<summary>Why is it risky?</summary>

Theme authors (including us) might have to update their theme over time: changing the component props, name, file system location, types... For example, consider a component that receives two props `name` and `age`, but after a refactor, it now receives a `person` prop with the above two properties. Your component, which still expects these two props, will render `undefined` instead.

Moreover, internal components may simply disappear. If a component is called `Sidebar` and it's later renamed to `DocSidebar`, your swizzled component will be completely ignored.

**Theme components marked as unsafe may change in a backward-incompatible way between theme minor versions.** When upgrading a theme (or Docusaurus), your customizations might **behave unexpectedly**, and can even **break your site**.

</details>

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_fb3f80d7

segments.source_content: For each theme component, the swizzle CLI will indicate **3 different levels of safety** declared by theme authors:

translations.zh-CN: 对于每个主题组件，swizzle CLI会显示主题作者声明的**3种安全等级**：

segments.source_content:
- **Safe**: this component is safe to be swizzled, its public API is considered stable, and no breaking changes should happen within a theme **major version**
- **Unsafe**: this component is a theme implementation detail, not safe to be swizzled, and breaking changes might happen within a theme **minor version**
- **Forbidden**: the swizzle CLI will prevent you from swizzling this component, because it is not designed to be swizzled at all

translations.zh-CN:
- **安全**：该组件可安全混编，其公共API被视为稳定，在主题**主版本**内不会出现破坏性变更
- **不安全**：该组件属于主题实现细节，混编不安全，在主题**次版本**升级时可能出现破坏性变更
- **禁止**：swizzle CLI将阻止您混编该组件，因其设计上完全不允许被混编

segments.source_content:
:::note

Some components might be safe to wrap, but not safe to eject.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::note

某些组件可能适合包装但不适合弹出。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::info

Don't be too **afraid to swizzle unsafe components**: just keep in mind that **breaking changes** might happen, and you might need to upgrade your customizations manually on minor version upgrades.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info

不必过度**畏惧混编不安全组件**：只需牢记可能会出现**破坏性变更**，在次版本升级时可能需要手动更新您的自定义代码。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::note[Report your use-case]

If you have a **strong use-case for swizzling an unsafe component**, please [**report it here**](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/5468) and we will work together to find a solution to make it safe.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::note[提交您的用例]

如果您有**必须混编不安全组件的强烈需求**，请[**在此提交报告**](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/5468)，我们将共同寻找使其安全的解决方案。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Which component should I swizzle? {#which-component-should-i-swizzle}

translations.zh-CN: ## 应该混编哪个组件？ {#which-component-should-i-swizzle}

segments.source_content: It is not always clear which component you should swizzle exactly to achieve the desired result. `@docusaurus/theme-classic`, which provides most of the theme components, has about [100 components](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/tree/main/packages/docusaurus-theme-classic/src/theme)!

translations.zh-CN: 要准确选择实现预期效果所需混编的组件并不总是显而易见。提供大多数主题组件的`@docusaurus/theme-classic`包含约[100个组件](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/tree/main/packages/docusaurus-theme-classic/src/theme)！

segments.source_content:
:::tip

To print an overview of all the `@docusaurus/theme-classic` components:

```bash npm2yarn
npm run swizzle @docusaurus/theme-classic -- --list
```

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

要打印`@docusaurus/theme-classic`所有组件的概览：

```bash npm2yarn
npm run swizzle @docusaurus/theme-classic -- --list
```

:::

segments.source_content: You can follow these steps to locate the appropriate component to swizzle:

translations.zh-CN: 您可以按照以下步骤定位需要混编的组件：

segments.source_content:
1. **Component description.** Some components provide a short description, which is a good way to find the right one.
2. **Component name.** Official theme components are semantically named, so you should be able to infer its function from the name. The swizzle CLI allows you to enter part of a component name to narrow down the available choices. For example, if you run `yarn swizzle @docusaurus/theme-classic`, and enter `Doc`, only the docs-related components will be listed.
3. **Start with a higher-level component.** Components form a tree with some components importing others. Every route will be associated with one top-level component that the route will render (most of them listed in [Routing in content plugins](./advanced/routing.mdx#routing-in-content-plugins)). For example, all blog post pages have `@theme/BlogPostPage` as the topmost component. You can start with swizzling this component, and then go down the component tree to locate the component that renders just what you are targeting. Don't forget to unswizzle the rest by deleting the files after you've found the correct one, so you don't maintain too many components.
4. **Read the [theme source code](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/tree/main/packages/docusaurus-theme-classic/src/theme)** and use search wisely.

translations.zh-CN:
1. **组件描述**。部分组件会提供简短描述，这是快速定位目标组件的有效方式。
2. **组件命名**。官方主题组件采用语义化命名，通常可通过名称推断功能。使用 swizzle CLI 时支持输入组件名片段进行筛选。例如执行 `yarn swizzle @docusaurus/theme-classic` 后输入 `Doc`，将只显示文档相关组件。
3. **从高层组件入手**。组件以树状结构相互引用，每个路由会关联一个顶级渲染组件（多数列于[内容插件路由](./advanced/routing.mdx#routing-in-content-plugins)）。例如所有博客文章页面的最顶层组件都是 `@theme/BlogPostPage`。可先置换该组件，再沿组件树向下定位具体目标组件。定位成功后请删除其他置换文件，避免维护过多组件。
4. **查阅[主题源码](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/tree/main/packages/docusaurus-theme-classic/src/theme)** 并善用搜索功能。

segments.source_content:
:::tip[Just ask!]

If you still have no idea which component to swizzle to achieve the desired effect, you can reach out for help in one of our [support channels](/community/support).

We also want to understand better your fanciest customization use-cases, so please [**report them**](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/5468).

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip[直接提问！]

若仍无法确定应置换哪个组件来实现效果，可通过我们的[支持渠道](/community/support)寻求帮助。

我们也希望了解您最前沿的定制需求，欢迎[提交讨论](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/5468)。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Do I need to swizzle? {#do-i-need-to-swizzle}

translations.zh-CN: ## 必须进行组件置换吗？ {#do-i-need-to-swizzle}

segments.source_content: Swizzling ultimately means you have to maintain some additional React code that interact with Docusaurus internal APIs. If you can, think about the following alternatives when customizing your site:

translations.zh-CN: 组件置换意味着需要维护与Docusaurus内部API交互的React代码。在定制站点时，建议优先考虑以下替代方案：

segments.source_content:
1. **Use CSS.** CSS rules and selectors can often help you achieve a decent degree of customization. Refer to [styling and layout](./styling-layout.mdx) for more details.
2. **Use translations.** It may sound surprising, but translations are ultimately just a way to customize the text labels. For example, if your site's default language is `en`, you can still run `yarn write-translations -l en` and edit the `code.json` emitted. Refer to the [i18n tutorial](./i18n/i18n-tutorial.mdx) for more details.

translations.zh-CN:
1. **使用CSS**。CSS规则和选择器通常能实现相当程度的定制效果，详见[样式与布局](./styling-layout.mdx)。
2. **利用国际化**。虽然看似意外，但国际化本质上是定制文本标签的途径。例如若站点默认语言为`en`，仍可执行`yarn write-translations -l en`后编辑生成的`code.json`文件，详见[i18n教程](./i18n/i18n-tutorial.mdx)。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

**The smaller, the better.** If swizzling is inevitable, prefer to swizzle only the relevant part and maintain as little code on your own as possible. Swizzling a small component often means less risk of **breaking changes** during upgrade.

[Wrapping](#wrapping) is also a far safer alternative to [ejecting](#ejecting).

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

**范围越小越好**。若必须置换，建议仅置换相关部分并尽量减少自主维护的代码量。置换小型组件通常能降低升级时的破坏性变更风险。

相比[完全置换](#ejecting)，[包装组件](#wrapping)是更安全的选择。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Wrapping your site with `<Root>` {#wrapper-your-site-with-root}

translations.zh-CN: ## 使用`<Root>`包装站点 {#wrapper-your-site-with-root}

segments.source_content: The `<Root>` component is rendered at the **very top** of the React tree, above the theme `<Layout>`, and **never unmounts**. It is the perfect place to add stateful logic that should not be re-initialized across navigations (user authentication status, shopping cart state...).

translations.zh-CN: `<Root>`组件在React树的最顶层渲染，位于主题`<Layout>`之上且永不卸载，是添加跨导航时需保持状态逻辑（用户认证状态、购物车状态等）的理想位置。

segments.source_content: Swizzle it **manually** by creating a file at `src/theme/Root.js`:

translations.zh-CN: 通过创建`src/theme/Root.js`文件手动置换：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_36948d49

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Use this component to render React Context providers.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

可用此组件渲染React Context提供者。

:::
